job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Data Pipelines: Python, BigQuery
     * Database: PostgreSQL
     * Cloud: GCP
     * Version Control: Git
     * We are continuously iterating and exploring technologies as we go - so there's more to come!

   How will you make an impact?
     * Our customers need to understand what happened across their bank accounts in the past as well as how balances evolve in the future. We have our first categorization & forecasting models for this. You'll join as the first Data hire with a broad mandate:
          + Define success metrics for our models
          + Create & evaluate forecasting & LLM models to drive those metrics
          + Build internal tooling to customise models to new enterprise customers
          + Build infrastructure to monitor performance and act on it
          + Build the underlying data infrastructure together with our engineering team (you'll meet them during the interviews!)
          + Explore new technologies that improve all of the above.
     * Collaborate with engineers, designers and founders (they come from Fintech & Treasury!) to understand better what needs to be built and speak up when we are focusing on the wrong things
job_details.full_text:
Senior Machine Learning Engineer

* Data Pipelines: Python, BigQuery
     * Database: PostgreSQL
     * Cloud: GCP
     * Version Control: Git
     * We are continuously iterating and exploring technologies as we go - so there's more to come!

   How will you make an impact?
     * Our customers need to understand what happened across their bank accounts in the past as well as how balances evolve in the future. We have our first categorization & forecasting models for this. You'll join as the first Data hire with a broad mandate:
          + Define success metrics for our models
          + Create & evaluate forecasting & LLM models to drive those metrics
          + Build internal tooling to customise models to new enterprise customers
          + Build infrastructure to monitor performance and act on it
          + Build the underlying data infrastructure together with our engineering team (you'll meet them during the interviews!)
          + Explore new technologies that improve all of the above.
     * Collaborate with engineers, designers and founders (they come from Fintech & Treasury!) to understand better what needs to be built and speak up when we are focusing on the wrong things

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and evaluating forecasting and LLM models, defining success metrics, and building underlying data infrastructure and monitoring performance. While LLMs are mentioned, the core focus is on predictive modeling, data pipelines, and MLOps, aligning with the 'ML Engineer' profile definition which includes productionizing prototypes and a strong emphasis on Data Engineering, Modeling, and Operations Engineering (MLOps).

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Create & evaluate forecasting & LLM models to drive those metrics' directly refers to the creation and evaluation of machine learning models, including both traditional forecasting and generative LLM models.
The phrase 'Build the underlying data infrastructure together with our engineering team' indicates responsibility for constructing and maintaining the foundational data systems.
The phrase 'Build infrastructure to monitor performance and act on it' describes the setup and management of systems for observing and responding to model performance in production.
job_tasks.phrase: Build infrastructure to monitor performance and act on it

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Define success metrics for our models' requires understanding how models contribute to business goals and translating those goals into measurable metrics.
job_tasks.phrase: Define success metrics for our models

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Build internal tooling to customise models to new enterprise customers' implies developing software tools to adapt and deploy models, which falls under software development for AI applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Build internal tooling to customise models

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with engineers, designers and founders... to understand better what needs to be built and speak up when we are focusing on the wrong things' highlights the need for teamwork and effective communication with various stakeholders.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with engineers, designers and founders

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Explore new technologies that improve all of the above' indicates a need to stay updated with and adopt new advancements in the field.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with engineers, designers and founders
Define success metrics for our models
